A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love the original trilogy\, particularly tESB. I didn't like the prequels\, but enjoyed some of the action and set pieces. I thought Force Awakens was a wild and fun ride with many imperfections I could overlook. The Last Jedi was 2..5 hours of \"meh\". It has a handful of good performances and cool characters\, but the story goes nowhere and is not very engaging. I'd recommend seeing it at a cheap afternoon matinee or wait for streaming. Hopefully\, episode IX will be an improvement.
